Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. This class holds a HashMap of all rooms and their exits of the game.
    Version:
    2021.02.01
    Author:
    Miladi Firas
